subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: Just 14 teams are taking part in the Cricket World Cup this year, down from 16 in 2007, and the field will shrink to 10 nations in 2019.
snippet: Just 14 teams are taking part in the Cricket World Cup this year, down from 16 in 2007, and the field will shrink to 10 nations in 2019.
